nodes.text: The Outer Rim Restaurant and Lounge was a restaurant located on Level A on one of the wings of Spaceport THX1138. Its motto was "We can provide meal and drinks for all kinds of being." Meals and drinks included on its menu were the Hive Cantina, Mandalorian Kri'gee, Garrmorl, the Twin Suns Special, Ithorian brandy, the Keela, and Polar water.
